SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DashboardView
The DashboardView class is the main user interface for the application.
Database
The Database class represents a database utility for managing users.
IFrame
The IFrame interface defines methods for initializing the view.
LayoutStyler
The LayoutStyler class provides methods for setting layout properties of nodes in JavaFX applications.
LoginController
The LoginController class is responsible for managing user authentication, including registering new users and verifying login credentials.
LoginVerificationException
The LoginVerificationException class is a custom exception used to indicate a failure during the login verification process.
LoginView
The LoginView class serves as the user interface for user authentication, including both login and registration processes.
PremiumUser
The PremiumUser class represents a user with premium privileges in the system.
User
Represents a user within the application.
UserSession
The UserSession class manages the session of the current user.
UserSessionNotifier
The UserSessionNotifier class manages observers for changes in user sessions.
UserSessionObserver
The UserSessionObserver interface defines a method to be called when the user session changes.
VotingController
The VotingController class manages the voting process within the application.
VotingSystem
The VotingSystem class manages the voting process for wines.
Wallet
The Wallet class represents a wallet for managing funds.
Wine
The Wine class represents a wine that can be voted on.
